title: Move speed rune replacements
body: Riot I've grown to love my move speed runes. Will there be an option in the new system that will give an unconditional move speed boost like the old runes did? I know you're adjusting base stats but sometimes I used move speed runes to help with off-meta strats. Personally I'd be fine with just a small % boost or maybe even towards enemy champs or away. Guys would you like to see the return of bonus move speed from runes or not?

replies.body: There will be such an option, yes.
